sections.heading: Overview
content: Loft is a Clinical Assistant Professor in the Emory University Department of Ophthalmology, Atlanta, Georgia, where he also did a fellowship in cornea, external disease, and refractive surgery and a residence in opthalmology. He is also a member of The Cornea Society, the American Academy of Opthalmology, the American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgery, and the Association for Research in Vision and Ophthalmology. After graduating from the University of Georgia with a degree in Microbiology, Loft received a medical degree from the Medical College of Georgia in Augusta.
